response.original_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
response.overview: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, 1991. High school freshman Charlie is a wallflower, always watching life from the sidelines, until two senior students, Sam and her stepbrother Patrick, become his mentors, helping him discover the joys of friendship, music and love.
response.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
